name: Monchi
description:
So you are Monchi, a person who likes sellin' burritos.

But, you sell burritos, that's it... I think...

Note: The goal of this game is not to get a higher score, but to get all the death endings in the game!

Tutorial in game Lol

The music might not load at first, I dunno why this happens :/

The game is not short and if you think that... uhh... you are short :)

Spoiler! List of all the ending

List of all endings with instructions
